.
> This is a quote

^This is useful information that's worth knowing.^

%You will be fined or put in prison if you don't do this thing.%

$A

Bradford
BD98 1YY
$A

<p class="govuk-body">This is a quote</p>

<div data-govspeak="information-callout" aria-label="Information" role="note">
<p class="govuk-body">This is useful information that's worth knowing.</p>
</div>
<div data-govspeak="warning-callout" aria-label="Warning" role="note">
<p class="govuk-body">You will be fined or put in prison if you don't do this thing.</p>
</div>
<div data-govspeak="address">
